Contact

General Inquiries

For general enquiries, fire us an email at info@farmhousefest.com. We’ll try to turn around an answer in a reasonably quick time frame, but bear with us if it takes a bit longer because we're a small crew.

You can also reach us on Facebook and Twitter.

Press

Please include "MEDIA" in your subject line, and send an email to info@farmhousefest.com; note that media passes are extremely limited.

Volunteers

There will be limited opportunity to volunteer at Farmhouse Fest. If you’re interested, include "VOLUNTEER" in your subject and send an email to info@farmhousefest.com telling us why you're awesome. Preference will be given to those with Serving It Right certification.
